page.title: 14Clubs
page.content:
Elsworth has a playgroup and a Mothers-and-Toddlers group for children under school age. There is a Brownie pack and a Guide company as well as Scouts and Cubs. There is a Beaver Club for 8-16 year olds, and a Youth Club for 11-16 year olds meets each week.
There is a branch of the Women's Institute and a branch of the Royal British Legion. Elsworth Jubilee Club is intended mainly for the over-60s. The school has an active Friends group (almost a PTA). Elsworth also has a Sports Club.
Papworth has a number of clubs and societies, several of which are based on the Community School.
